alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Walton County through 115 PM CDT... At 1242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Vernon to 9 miles north of Panama City Beach to 21 miles west of Panama City. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, De Funiak Springs, Tyndall Air Force Base, Eglin Air Force Base, Parker, Freeport, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Rock Hill, Biltmore Beach, Sunnyside, Knox Hill and Bunker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
